mapper.insert: insert into Member_Attest_Type (Attest_Type_ID, Member_Type, Attest_TypeName, Attach_Type, Picture_Url, Need_Check, Can_More, Type_Cure, Admin_ID,Credit_Score) values (#{attestTypeID},#{memberType},#{attestTypeName},#{attachType},#{pictureUrl},#{needCheck},#{canMore},#{typeCure},#{optId},#{creditScore})
mapper.select: select Attest_Type_ID as attestTypeID from Member_Attest_Type where Attest_TypeName=#{attestTypeName} and Attest_Type_ID !=#{attestTypeID}
mapper.update:
update Member_Attest_Type
Member_Type=#{memberType},
Attest_TypeName=#{attestTypeName},
Attach_Type=#{attachType},
Picture_Url=#{pictureUrl},
Need_Check=#{needCheck},
Can_More=#{canMore},
Type_Cure=#{typeCure},
Credit_Score=#{creditScore},
Admin_ID=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now(),
where Attest_Type_ID=#{attestTypeID}
update Member_Attest_Type set Statu=#{statu} where Attest_Type_ID=#{attestTypeID}
